Hierarch Kekropus:
May the kindness of Mighty Ones be with you...
I am Kekropus, the head of Kamaels. I am the eldest and the most experienced among my people.
How many years have passed since we got free from the seal? I guess, only now we can say that we are truly interacting with the outer world. But we have hard times now. Since the Goddess of Destruction was reborn, all the world has been in danger.
When her deeds have got to the Isle of Souls, we started to argue if we should lay low or take action. And then we have heard the voice of the Giant, our master. Here, on the Talking Island.
